data: If donor is EBV positive and recipient EBV negative, do not give anti-thymocyte globulin
Start on day of surgery, either intraoperatively (kidney) or in PACU (pancreas), or after PICC line insertion and on arrival to Transplant Unit (islets)
Select 1 mg/kg for ECD or DCD, 1.5 mg/kg for high immunologic risk
anti-thymocyte globulin (rabbit) (anti-thymocyte globulin rabbit 25 mg inj)
1 mg/kg, IV, as directed, order duration: 1 day, drug form: inj
1.5 mg/kg, IV, as directed, order duration: 1 doses or times, drug form: inj
500 mg, IV, as directed, order duration: 1 day, drug form: inj
125 mg, IV, as directed, order duration: 1 day, drug form inj
650 mg, PO, as directed, order duration: 1 day,drug form: tab
650 mg, NG-tube, as directed, order duration: 1  day, drug form: tab
650 mg, rectal, as directed, order duration: 1 day, drug form: supp
50 mg, IV, as directed, order duration: 1 day, drug form: inj
25 mg, IV, as directed, order duration: 1 day, drug form: inj

Total anti-thymocyte globulin dosing includes the perioperative / Day 0 dose. Select:
- 1 mg/kg for ECD or DCD, total 3 doses (maximum 3 mg/kg)
-  1.5 mg/kg for high immunologic risk, total 4 doses (maximum 6 mg/kg)
- 1.5 mg/kg for islet, total 5 doses

Dose to be reassessed daily. Consider adjusting anti-thymocyte globulin dose to half dose if WBC is between 2 to 3 giga/L or platelet count is 50 to 75 giga/L, and consider holding dose if WBC is less than 2 giga/L or platelet count is below 50 giga/L
anti-thymocyte globulin (rabbit) (anti-thymocyte globulin rabbit 25 mg inj)
1 mg/kg, IV, q24h, order duration: 2 doses or times, drug form: inj
1 mg/kg, IV, q24h, order duration: 3  doses or times, drug form: inj
1 mg/kg, IV, q24h, order duration: 4  doses or times, drug form: inj
1.5 mg/kg, IV, q24h, order duration: 2  doses or times, drug form: inj
1.5 mg/kg, IV, q24h, order duration: 3  doses or times, drug form: inj
1.5 mg/kg, IV, q24h, order duration:  4 doses or times, drug form: inj
Pre treatment medications to be reassessed after 2 doses
650 mg, PO, as directed, order duration: 1 day,drug form: tab
650 mg, NG-tube, as directed, order duration: 1 day, drug form: tab
650 mg, rectal, as directed, order duration: 1 day, drug form: supp
50 mg, IV, as directed, order duration: 1 day, drug form: inj
25 mg, IV, as directed, order duration: 1 day, drug form: inj
650 mg, PO, as directed, PRN pain - mild or fever, order duration: 3 day, drug form: tab
650 mg, NG-tube, as directed, PRN pain - mild or fever, order duration: 3 day, drug form: oral liq
650 mg, rectal, as directed, PRN pain - mild or fever,  order duration: 3 day, drug form: supp
50 mg, IV, as directed, PRN rash, order duration: 3 day, drug form: inj
25 mg, IV, as directed, PRN rash, order duration: 3 day, drug form: inj
Kidney - stop steroids after day 6 if patient no longer with DGF risk and low immunologic risk

For low immunologic risk, order only Day 1 methylPREDNIsolone sodium succinate, then STOP steroids. 
For medium or high immunologic risk or DGF, order Day 1 methylPREDNIsolone sodium succinate and  predniSONE taper
